test.eval: let o = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(document.cookie.split(';').find(c => c.indexOf('cookiefirst') !== -1).trim()).split('=')[1]); (o.performance === false && o.functional === false && o.advertising === false) ? true : false

then.eval: document.querySelectorAll('#moove_gdpr_cookie_modal input').forEach(i => { if (!i.disabled && i.name !== 'moove_gdpr_strict_cookies') i.checked = false }) || true
